RT‚ÄÇThorne üå∏ ens0.eth
Wrote about the Great Yuga Gas Wars of last night and how they reflect poorly upon web3.
We need responsible launches of high-demand projects, L2s that don't become walled gardens, and, most of all, reliably low transaction fees for most people.‚ÄÇhttps://smol.news/p/the-great-yuga-gas-wars
